creator: olivers@tibcofinance.com
text:
JspC leaks memory (this is JDK 1.3 on Solaris 2.8).

Tested a fairly complex webapp with a taglib:
/local/jdk1.3/bin/java -Xms128M -Xmx256M org.apache.jasper.JspC
-d out -webapp in

Memory consumption grows linearly with every compiled JSP page
(using 256MB heap it never passed 250 pages). It normally aborts
with a java.lang.OutOfMemoryException.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Try compiling smaller subsets as a workaround. Jasper needs a major refactoring,
and a lot will probably change, including jspc
